2: הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַלְאָכָ֑יו <sup>4397 </sup> <n>ye him all his angels</n> הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> [צְבָאֹו כ] (צְבָאָֽיו׃ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>appointed time</n> ק)
3: הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>ye him sun</n> וְיָרֵ֑חַ <sup>3394 </sup> <n>and moon</n> הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> כּ֥וֹכְבֵי <sup>3556 </sup> <n>him all ye stars</n> אֽוֹר׃ <sup>216 </sup> <n>of light</n>
4: הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> שְׁמֵ֣י <sup>8064 </sup> <n>him ye heavens</n> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heavens</n> וְ֝הַמַּ֗יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and ye waters</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> מֵעַ֬ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>that [be] above the heavens</n>
5: יְֽ֭הַֽלְלוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Let them praise</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ה֭וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> צִוָּ֣ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>for he commanded</n> וְנִבְרָֽאוּ׃ <sup>1254 </sup> <n>and they were created</n>
6: וַיַּעֲמִידֵ֣ם <sup>5975 </sup> <n>He hath also stablished</n> לָעַ֣ד <sup>5703 </sup> <n>them for ever</n> לְעוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>and ever</n> חָק־ <sup>2706 </sup> <n>a decree</n> נָ֝תַ֗ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he hath made</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>which will not</n> יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>which shall not pass</n>
